name: Pyromania
description: The cultist sends word through her dreams. The project is ready, %LOCATION_NAME can be detonated at your command. You need only bring an agent, and tell them to begin the work.

choices.name: We had best make good use of this
choices.description: Moving an agent to %LOCATION_NAME will give you the option to detonate the city. If you select it, %LOCATION_NAME will be burnt to the ground, with your agent making a quick escape. No evidence will remain, a natural disaster will be the assumed cause
